# Fuel

* fuel consumed

```{r}
  
fuel_burnt <- fuel_wgts %>%
                tidyr::spread(var, val) %>%
                filter(!is.na(mass_dry_new_first))

fuel_burnt[ , 18][is.na(fuel_burnt[ , 18] ) ] <- 0

fuel_burnt <- mutate(fuel_burnt, wgt_ashpot_unusedfuel =
                       ifelse(wgt_ashpot_unusedfuel %in% 0, wgt_ashpot_lid, wgt_ashpot_unusedfuel)) %>%
              mutate(unused_fuel = wgt_ashpot_unusedfuel - wgt_ashpot_lid) %>%
              mutate(char_ash = wgt_ashpot_char_ash - wgt_ashpot_unusedfuel)

fuel_burnt <- fuel_burnt %>%
                filter(!is.na(wgt_ashpot_lid)) %>%
                dplyr::select(id, mass_dry_new_sum, wgt_ashpot_char_ash,
                              wgt_ashpot_lid, wgt_ashpot_unusedfuel, unused_fuel, char_ash) %>%
                mutate(mass_burnt_wrong = mass_dry_new_sum + wgt_ashpot_lid - wgt_ashpot_char_ash,
                       units = "g") %>%
                mutate(mass_burned_correct = (mass_dry_new_sum - unused_fuel) - char_ash)
                

```

```{r, fig.width = 12, fig.height = 8}
  p_data <- dplyr::left_join(samples, fuel_burnt) %>%
            dplyr::mutate(id = as.factor(id))

  ggplot(p_data, aes(x = id, y = mass_burned_correct, colour = stove)) +
        geom_point() +
        theme_minimal() + 
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust = 1)) +
        theme(legend.position = "top") +
        ylab("fuel burnt (g)")
```
